content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. I am always open to discussing rental prices. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my situation as a responsible student, I aim for an affordable cost. How about proposing a price considerably lower than the current market rate, as a gesture of understanding my circumstances?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Haoyu, but I can't accept that. I'm looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is far too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
